papers.title: RF Controls Towards Femtosecond and Attosecond Precision
authors: RF controls have improved by two orders in magnitude achieving meanwhile sub-10 fs phase stabilities and 10-4 amplitude precision. Advances are through improved field detection methods and massive usage of digital signal procession on very powerful field programmable gate arrays (FPGAs). The question rise
what can be achieved in the next 10 years? In this talk
a review is given of existing systems and strategies
current stability limitations of RF control system and new technologies with the potential to achieve attosecond resolutions.
